title: TikTok CEO fails to convince Congress that the app is not a “weapon” for China
description: Passing a data privacy bill is "the only way to stop TikTok," committee says.

title: Meta slams telco fee proposal, says ISPs should pay their own network costs
description: Meta: "Our investments in content drive the business model of telecom operators."

title: Missouri House advances bill to limit nonexistent vaccine microchips—just in case
description: The bill aims to stop COVID vaccine mandates while promoting conspiracy theories.

title: There’s a simpler answer to ‘Oumuamua’s weird orbit: Outgassing hydrogen
description: ‘Oumuamua is "a standard interstellar comet that just experienced heavy processing."

title: Tech makers must provide repairs for up to 10 years under proposed EU law
description: Proposal doesn't enforce affordable spare parts, manuals, rights group complains.

title: “Click-to-cancel” rule would penalize companies that make you cancel by phone
description: Canceling a subscription shouldn't be harder than signing up, FTC proposal says.

title: The Leia Lume Pad 2 is a $1,100, glasses-free 3D Android tablet
description: A light field display and face tracking bring the 3D display to life, supposedly.

title: The Paja Formation: An ecosystem of monsters
description: What allowed an ecosystem to support toothy predators all over the food chain?

title: Framework gives its modular laptops 13th-gen Intel CPUs and (finally) an AMD option
description: Motherboards fit existing Framework laptops, now called "Framework Laptop 13."

title: Framework’s next project is a 16-inch modular, upgradeable gaming laptop
description: Keyboard system is designed to placate numpad lovers and numpad haters.

title: Chipmakers fight spread of US crackdowns on “forever chemicals”
description: Intel helped form lobbying group that has opposed state legislation on PFAS.

title: Ford will lose $3 billion on electric vehicles in 2023, it says
description: Ford is profitable, but the EV division should be seen as a startup, it says.

title: Relativity Space has a successful failure with the debut of Terran 1
description: "Today is a huge win, with many historic firsts."

title: Epic’s new motion-capture animation tech has to be seen to be believed
description: "MetaHuman Animator" goes from iPhone video to high-fidelity 3D movement in minutes.
